entities.name: narcissa
entities.description: Narcissa is described as sitting beside Bellatrix and being unlike her in looks. She has dark hair and heavily lidded eyes.

entities.name: bellatrix
entities.description: Bellatrix is described as leaning towards Voldemort and having a different bearing and demeanor compared to Narcissa.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is described as considering Bellatrix and acknowledging her words as meaningful.

relationships.description: Narcissa is unlike Bellatrix in looks, but similar in bearing and demeanor.
Voldemort appreciates Bellatrix's words and acknowledges their meaning.
